column1:
share on x ac anne cerny. jun 20 at 5:25 pm mark mentored 3 of our sons and nephew, weston cerny, kirk cerny, nathan cerny, and zeb david reeves when they worked for him at aircom while attending byu. they have all gone on to very successful careers in computer science because of mark. currently our dear friend who feels like family, josh schultz works for mark. providing young people a successful career means so much. it is especially hard to lose your boss. our sympathies go out to all who work for him. years ago we had car trouble and mark traveled 1 hour to pick us up. great family and children. we loved you. mark and amy have been great examples for our sons. submitted by anne and william cerny dds, openshaw family's dentist. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 20 at 1:32 pm beautiful in blue was purchased for the family of bishop charles mark openshaw ii. share on x more memories... court of honor. jun 21. 6:00 pm edgemont 8th ward chapel3050 n. mojave lane (3050 n. 1100 e.)provo, ut, us, 84604. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. visitation. jun 22. 9:30 am - 10:45 am edgemont south stake center2950 north canyon road (350 east)provo, ut, us, 84604. get order flowers now for charles 's visitation funeral service. jun 22. 11:00 am edgemont south stake center2950 north canyon road (350 east)provo, ut, us, 84604. get order flowers now for charles 's funeral service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe berg mortuary website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for charles 's visitation funeral service. jun 22. 11:00 am edgemont south stake center2950 north canyon road (350 east)provo, ut, us, 84604. get order flowers now for charles 's funeral service cemetery details. east lawn memorial hills4800 north 650 east. provo, ut, us, 84604. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of bishop charles mark openshaw ii a friend sent flowers to the family of bishop charles mark openshaw ii. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! mg max grogan. jun 21 at 2:00 pm i flew my plane to provo in august, 2009. prior to the trip, from an internet forum, mark contacted me and offered the use of a hangar and suburban during my stay. we became fast friends immediately upon meeting, and have stayed in touch over the years. during the stay, my wife and i had dinner with mark and amy. i suggested a name for their expected child. a week or two later mark called to tell me "little max" had arrived. i am honored they would name their fifth child after me. i loved mark and his spirit. i will miss him greatly. max grogan. knoxville, tncomment share comment share facebook twitter
